turkish_example_sentence: O genç talentli müzisyen sahne de şarkı söylemek isteye.
english_example_sentence: May he/she want to sing a song on stage as a young talented musician.
russian_example_sentence: Пусть он/она захочет петь песню на сцене как молодой талантливый музыкант.
